summary: A simple mod which changes the gold value of the drinks added in Dragonborn to their values in Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the gold value of the drinks added in Dragonborn to their values in Morrowind.
Just a very simple mod I created because I found it odd that Flin was worth so little.

- Changes -
Flin: 15 gold to 100 gold
Matze: 5 gold to 10 gold
Shein: 10 gold (stayed the same)
Sujamma: 10 gold to 30 gold
author: CurryGuts
